Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2017 04:01AM JadB2016 wrote: Thoughts of calm and peace are with you.  Crazy times in our life.  I too have allowed work to allow for distractions from this new life.
Posts.Title: waiting on biopsy results, Dr. is sure it's cancer Pangie JadB2016

Posts.Content: JadB2016 wrote: I'm waiting as patiently as possible with everyone here too.  First mammogram on 12/19, age 41.  Mammogram led to scheduled u/s and two site biopsies on 1/5.  DCIS highly suspected.  The doctor already scheduled me with a surgical consult on 1/11.  Biopsy result should be available 1/9 or 1/10.  Waiting...  Bi-Rads following my 1/5 visit was 4c.  I'm not up to speed on all that has occurred in my whirlwind of a life lately.  Much to take in and much more to consider and look at to follow next week. I have appreciated all of the reading and information I have been able to gather from viewing the posts on this board.  I haven't responded to any post.  My apologies.  I believe I'm in shock yet.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Another in the waiting room... JadB2016 MTwoman

Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2017 06:56AM JadB2016 wrote: Thank you ajbclan for your response.  It is greatly appreciated.  Biopsy results came in Monday late afternoon.  The doctor's belief that it was DCIS was confirmed.  Both biopsy sites were grade 3.  Consult with the surgeon will happen today and an MRI to follow.  I'm glad these boards are here for support.  The support and education gained from this site is needed.
Posts.Title: Another in the waiting room... JadB2016 MTwoman
